body_html:
I am using something like this with TF 1.8 (GPU version) with no issue:

distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(num_gpus=2)
config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(train_distribute=distribution)
body_text:
I am using something like this with TF 1.8 (GPU version) with no issue:
distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(num_gpus=2)
config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(train_distribute=distribution)
body:
I am using something like this with TF 1.8 (GPU version) with no issue:
```
distribution = tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy(num_gpus=2)
config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(train_distribute=distribution)
```
